dowry.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: property and money that a woman gives to her husband when they marry in some societies
dowry.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: money which is given by one company to a company it is trying to buy. The dowry is meant to encourage the second company to agree to the arrangement
dowry.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: The government has already written off £5 billion worth of debts and thrown in an extra £1.6 billion dowry.
dowry.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: money or valuable gifts that in some cultures the family of a BRIDE gives to her husband when she gets married
